description:
This course will cover all of the iOS accessibility features up to iOS 6 for both the iPhone and iPad. The course with go in depth into 3 key accessibility features:

1. VoiceOver

2. AssistiveTouch

3. Guided Access

The in depth videos include setup, the feature in action and usage scenarios. There is a resource list at the end for further information.
title: Accessibility Features of iOS for the iPad and iPhone
